name: Mitosis
permanentEffect: Your space docks cannot produce ground forces.
window: At the start of the status phase
windowEffect: Place 1 ground force from your reinforcements on any planet you control.

name: Quantum Entanglement
permanentEffect: You treat all systems that contain a non-delta wormhole as adjacent to each other. Game effects cannot prevent you from using this ability.

name: Slipstream
windowEffect: Apply +1 to the move value of each of your ships that starts its movement in your home system or in a system that contains a non-delta wormhole.

name: Munitions Reserves
window: At the start of each round of space combat
windowEffect: You may spend 2 resources; you may reroll any number of your dice during that combat round.

name: Ambush
window: At the start of a space combat
windowEffect: You may roll 1 die for each of up to 2 of your cruisers or destroyers in the system. For each result equal to or greater than that ship's combat value produce 1 hit; your opponent must assign it to 1 of their non-fighter ships.

name: Star Forge
windowEffect: Spend 1 token from your strategy pool to place either 2 fighters or 1 destroyer from your reinforcements in a system that contains 1 or more of your war suns or your flagship.

name: Galactic Threat
window: Once per agenda, after an agenda is revealed
windowEffect: You may predict aloud the outcome of that agenda. If your prediction is correct, gain 1 technology that is owned by a player who voted how you predicted.

name: Reclamation
window: After you gain control of Mecatol Rex
windowEffect: You may place 1 PDS and 1 space dock from your reinforcements on Mecatol Rex.
